title: President Donald J. Trump’s New Strategy on Iran – The White House
content:
Fact Sheets			

		Foreign Policy	

Issued on:
October 13, 2017
It is time for the entire world to join us in demanding that Iran’s government end its pursuit of death and destruction.
						President Donald J. Trump					President Donald J. Trump, in consultation with his national security team, has approved a new strategy for Iran. It is the culmination of nine months of deliberation with Congress and our allies on how to best protect American security.Core Elements of the President’s New Iran StrategyThe Nature of the Iranian Regime under Supreme Leader KhameneiThe Threats from the Iranian RegimeThe Need for a Comprehensive StrategyCountering the IRGCThe Iranian Nuclear Program and the Joint Comprehensive Plan of Action
